events.title: Waves of Wellness @ Marina Central
events.description: Join Waves of Wellness 2025 in Marina Central for two weeks of free workouts, crafts and a special Stride & Seek Game.

events.title: Stewarding Nature & Heritage in Tanjong Pagar
events.description: Explore how Tanjong Pagar evolved from a port town to green urban district while preserving its heritage and nature.

events.title: Self-guided Toa Payoh Heritage Trail
events.description: Explore Toa Payoh's iconic landmarks through a heritage trail. Visit us to redeem exclusive prizes (while stocks last)!

events.title: A guided tour of New Bahru
events.description: A walk through New Bahru—where its cherished heritage is thoughtfully woven into a new purpose for today. Explore Singapore's first creative cluster built upon the old bones of the former Nan Chiau High School.

events.title:
Fort Canning Park: 
Trees of the Fort Tour
events.description: Discover unique trees! See giant Kapok, Banyan roots, record Madras Thorn & upsidedown Baobab on this park tour.

events.title:
North-South Corridor Master Plan Pop-up @ 
Toa Payoh Hub
events.description: Visit our booth at Toa Payoh Hub to learn about & share views on the North-South Corridor Surface Streets Master Plan!

events.title:
Craft Workshop: 
Marina East Edition
events.description: Learn about Singapore's planning & design Marina East's future through a 1hr hands-on workshop at NLB on 9 Aug, 3pm!

events.title:
Fort Canning Park: 
Heritage on the Hill tour
events.description: Explore Fort Canning's journey from the 14th century to the Colonial Era! Discover ancient artefacts and its evolution.

events.title: Reimagine the Newton Flyover and Viaduct space!
events.description: Design Newton flyover and viaduct space through a collaborative design and sticker colouring session!

events.title:
Designing our Tomorrow: Craft Workshop & 
Gallery Tour
events.description: Design your 'Long Island' & tour Sustainable Singapore Gallery! Workshop venus @ Toa Payoh Hub

events.title: Guided tour of Bidadari Park and Woodleigh Hillside Estate
events.description: Explore Bidadari Park's Pooh-inspired charm and discover how this estate was designed as a "Community in a Garden"

events.title: Guided tour of MOE’s Heritage Centre
events.description: Discover Singapore's education story at MOE Heritage Centre! See how schools evolved through interactive displays.

events.title:
Harmony in Diversity: 
ArtsEverywhere @ CDC
events.description: Experience Bharatanatyam & Joget dance culture! Join performances & interactive workshops.

events.title: Building Homes with the Environment in Mind
events.description: Discover how HDB plans liveable and sustainable homes while balancing Singapore's diverse land needs.

events.title: Designing our Tomorrow: Coastal Crafts Workshop & Gallery Tour
events.description: Design your 'Long Island' & tour Sustainable Singapore Gallery! Workshop venus @ Toa Payoh Hub

events.title: North-South Corridor Master Plan Pop-up
events.description: Visit our booth at Toa Payoh Hub to learn about & share views on the North-South Corridor Surface Streets Master Plan!

events.title:
Crafts Workshop: 
Woodlands Waterfront Edition
events.description: Be city planners for a day! Join this fun 1hr workshop to design Woodlands Waterfront town with your family.

events.title: Guided tours of Mangroves at Pasir Ris Park
events.description: Join our guided Pasir Ris mangrove walk! Spot herons, mudskippers & crabs while learning about unique root systems.

events.title: Self-guided tour of Sembawang Heritage Trail
events.description: Discover Sembawang through a heritage trail. Snap selfies and get exclusive prizes at Causeway Point while stocks lasts!

events.title: Self-guided tour of Woodlands Heritage Trail
events.description: Discover Woodlands through a heritage trail. Snap a selfie and get exclusive prizes at Causeway Point while stocks last!

events.title: Self-guided tour of Northern Explorer Loop
events.description: Explore parks along the Northern Explorer Loop. Snap selfies to get exclusive prizes at Causeway Point while stocks last!

events.title: Sun Plaza Park: Therapeutic Garden Activity
events.description: Join therapeutic horticulture sessions: Guided nature activities to boost wellbeing through gardening.

events.title: Dream Storeys by Clara Chow (Singapore Literature Book Club)
events.description: Meet Clara Chow and discuss her novel that turns the ideas of real urban visionaries into inventive short stories.

events.title: Coastal Crafts Workshop & Singapore Sustainability Gallery Tour
events.description: Design your 'Long Island' & tour Sustainable Singapore Gallery! Workshop @ Our Tampines Hub.

events.title: Coastal Crafts Workshop & Singapore Sustainability Gallery Tour
events.description: Design your 'Long Island' & tour Sustainable Singapore Gallery! Workshop @ Our Tampines Hub.

events.title: Guided Tour of sports facilities in Bukit Canberra
events.description: Bukit Canberra, a 12ha hub near Sembawang MRT, offers diverse sports and wellness facilities. Come join us on a tour!

events.title: North-South Corridor Master Plan Pop-up @ Causeway Point
events.description: Visit our booth at Causeway Point to learn about & share views on the North-South Corridor Surface Streets Master Plan!

events.title: Paper Paradise @ URA Gallery
events.description: Kids 7-12: Design 'Long Island' with AI! Join our parent-child holiday workshop to explore Singapore's future planning.

events.title:
Sungei Buloh Tour: 
What's in my Water?
events.description: Explore Sungei Buloh's waterways! Discover fascinating plants & wildlife on our morning nature walk.

events.title: Visioning workshop for former Singapore Racecourse
events.description: Sign up to be a part of this Focus Group Discussion to share ideas on the planning for the former Singapore Racecourse!

events.title: Award ceremony for the Visions of the Sembawang Shipyard Competition
events.description: Join us for "Visions of Sembawang Shipyard" Poetry Competition awards ceremony & public reading of winning poems!

events.title: Tampines Transformed: Rejuvenate Your Regional Hub!
events.description: Shape TRC's future! Join URA planners for a walking tour to create a more vibrant Tampines town centre

events.title: From Eye Level to High Level: Urban Planning in Bedok
events.description: Join URA's planners on this Bedok walking tour to learn more about how planners work with the community and stakeholders!

events.title: Biodiversity Walk at Lim Chu Kang Nature Park/Cashin House
events.description: Join us on a family-friendly walk in Lim Chu Kang! Explore rubber plantations, mangroves & Cashin House!

events.title: Workshop: Craft A Coastal Neighbourhood Protected Against Rising Seas
events.description: Envision, design & build a coastal neighbourhood that combines vibrant community spaces with coastal protection solutions.

events.title: DMP25 x SG60 x PAssion Wave Cycling tour
events.description: Cycle from PAssion Wave to Sembawang Hot Spring Park! Join our SG60 celebration on this scenic 3-hour round trip.

events.title: DMP25 x SG60 x PAssion Wave Walking Heritage Tour
events.description: Explore historic Kampong Wak Hassan! Walk coastal paths, see heritage bungalows & end at PAssion Wave for sea views.

events.description: Want to learn more about the North-South Corridor Surface Streets Master Plan and share your views? Come visit our booth at Causeway Point!

events.description: Cycle from PAssion Wave to Sembawang Hot Spring Park! Join our SG60 celebration on this scenic 3-hour round trip.
